announcements.title: Spring Garden Opening
announcements.description: Join us for our Spring Garden Opening Ceremony on March 15th at 10:00 AM. Refreshments provided!

announcements.title: Water Conservation Notice
announcements.description: Due to recent drought conditions, please limit watering to early mornings and evenings only.

announcements.title: Plot Registration
announcements.description: Plot registration for the 2025 season is now open! Reserve your spot before February 28th.

upcomingEvents.title: Spring Planting Workshop
upcomingEvents.description: Learn best practices for spring planting, including soil preparation, seed starting, and transplanting.

upcomingEvents.title: Composting Basics
upcomingEvents.description: Discover how to create and maintain a healthy compost system for your garden plot.

upcomingEvents.title: Kids Garden Exploration Day
upcomingEvents.description: A fun-filled day where children can explore the garden, plant seeds, and learn about nature.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Garden Maintenance
volunteerOpportunities.description: Help with general garden upkeep including weeding, mulching, and path maintenance.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Educational Workshop Leader
volunteerOpportunities.description: Share your gardening knowledge by leading workshops on various gardening topics.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Compost Team Member
volunteerOpportunities.description: Join our composting team to help manage our compost system and educate members.

volunteerOpportunities.title: Community Harvest Coordinator
volunteerOpportunities.description: Coordinate harvesting and donation of excess produce to local food banks.

seasonalTips.title: Winter Garden Prep
seasonalTips.description: Prepare your garden for winter by adding mulch, cleaning tools, and planning for spring.

seasonalTips.title: Spring Soil Health
seasonalTips.description: Improve your soil health with compost, cover crops, and proper pH balancing.

seasonalTips.title: Summer Water Conservation
seasonalTips.description: Conserve water with drip irrigation, mulching, and early morning watering techniques.
